title: Bug 18797MemoryUserRule doesn't validate user attributes
description: The implementation of org.apache.catalina.realm.MemoryRuleSet.begin dosen'tvalidate the attribute values before adding a user to the MemoryRealm. Ifusername or name are not present then a null username is used which can causeodd problems later on.Basically the method should check that parameters passed to MemoryRealm.addUserare not null before calling the method.
